s: 1 day ago - Troian Bellisario and Brandon Larracuente, On Call Amazon MGM Studios · This cop drama from executive producer Dick Wolf (Law & Order, One Chicago) is Prime Video's first true procedural. It's follows two Long Beach police officers, rookie Alex Diaz (Brandon Larracuente) and veteran Traci Harmon (Troian Bellisario), as they go about their shift, responding to calls and trying to crack a larger season-long case when time allows. It's different from Wolf's network shows ...
